instruction_set.description: TestCase 1: Verify the Leetcode Homepage URL
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that you are on the Leetcode website with the correct URL.

instruction_set.description: TestCase 4: Ensure the submissions tab displays "Register or Sign In"
instruction_set.error_out: Check the submissions tab and verify if it shows "Register or Sign In."
instruction_set.hint: Ensure that "Register or Sign In" is displayed when you click on the submission tab.
